notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The study was supported by the TB Modelling and Analysis Consortium (Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, OPP1083276) and additional support for HS from Fonds de Recherche Sant√© Post-Doctoral Fellowship training award (36095). The funders of this study had no role or influence in the study design, analysis, or interpretation of the data and in the writing of the manuscript.
